description: Set the AWS Endpoint Connection state

parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`cockroach_cloud_set_aws_endpoint_connection_state`]

cluster_id.description: cluster_id is the ID for the cluster.

endpoint_id.description: endpoint_id is the ID for the VPC endpoint on the customer's side.
